mapper.select: SELECT com.t_commodity_id commodityId , com.gt_id gtId, com.c_goods_sn goodsSn, com.c_name 'name', com.c_counter_price counterPrice, com.c_retail_price goodsMoney, com.c_brief goodsInt FROM t_commodity com WHERE com.c_goods_sn = #{goId}

SELECT u.user_status userStatus, uq.userquan_status userquanStatus, quan.q_id qId, quan.q_status qStatus, quan.q_createTime qCreateTime, quan.q_endTime qEndTime, quan.q_about qAbout, quan.q_discount qDiscount, quan.q_min qMin FROM t_userquan uq LEFT JOIN t_user u ON u.user_id=uq.user_id LEFT JOIN t_quan quan ON quan.q_id=uq.q_id WHERE u.user_id = #{goId}

SELECT u.user_status userStatus, ad.qu_id quId, ad.us_name usName, ad.us_phone usPhone, ad.us_status usStatus, x.qy_name FROM t_useraddress ad LEFT JOIN t_user u ON u.user_id = ad.user_id LEFT JOIN t_xzqy x ON x.qu_id = ad.qu_id WHERE u.user_id = #{goId}
